name: clix-flutter-sdk-scripts
description: Build scripts for Clix Flutter SDK

scripts.build: flutter packages get && dart compile kernel lib/clix.dart -o build/clix.dill
scripts.lint:fix: dart fix --apply && dart format lib/ test/ samples/
scripts.deps:check: dart pub deps && dart pub outdated
scripts.all: npm run format && npm run lint:fix && npm run test && npm run build
